roleset.name: cause to be fiery, (causing to) become inflamed, causing swelling, redness, anger, inflammation, swollen
roleset.note: INFLAME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inflame' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from inflame.01-v predicate notes)
INFLAMMATORY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from inflammatory.01-j)
INFLAMED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from inflamed.01-j)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [Adm. Goupil's comments]-1 are likely [*-1]to inflame the broader dispute within the military establishment here over the role of Dassault.
example.arg: the broader dispute within the military establishment here over the role of Dassault

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The inflammation of Jose's liver became serious enough the he was put on the transplant list.
